goal.core.kr

Class KRFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.core.kr.KRFactory

  • public class KRFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory for language support.
    Author:
    W.Pasman 6sept11

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void add(KRlanguage implementation)
      Add a language to the list of known languages.

      Get an implementation for given language.
      We store based on strings because we cannot know the available languages beforehand.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static KRlanguage get(java.lang.String language)
                      throws java.util.NoSuchElementException
        Get an implementation for given language.
        We store based on strings because we cannot know the available languages beforehand.
        Parameters:
        language - The name of the language, e.g. "swiprolog" or "pddl" (not case-sensitive).
        Returns:
        an implementation of the given language.
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if language is unknown.

      • add

        public static void add(KRlanguage implementation)
        Add a language to the list of known languages.
        Parameters:
        implementation - The KRlanguage.

      • getLanguages

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getLanguages()
        Returns:
        All registered KR languages.

      • getDefaultLanguage

        public static KRlanguage getDefaultLanguage()
        Returns the default KR language.
        Returns:
        The default KR language.
